issues.title: Managing branches
issues.body:
Add support for managing branches.

There should be support to:

* Change default branch.
* Add branch.
* Delete branch.
* Clone branch.
* Rename branch.

issues.title: Add issue and pull request templates
issues.body:
Add support for issue and pull request templates. There should also be support for multiple templates.

It would be great if Git Center would support the same format as GitHub.

issues.title: Disabling issues and pull requests
issues.body: Add support to disable issues and/or pull requests. This would be useful if repository has some other way for doing this (mirrored from GitHub, issue forum...).

issues.title: Fetch and push with URL
issues.body:
Currently, it is only possible to clone repository with local path to repository's directory (like `git clone $path_to_data/18r929Hq8hE5Pi9Zf7ovMQVyn3WcGfxMgu/gitcenter.git`). This is not so good because sometimes path will be very long and hard to type.

It would be better to clone and fetch repository directly with URL (like `git clone http://127.0.0.1:43110/18r929Hq8hE5Pi9Zf7ovMQVyn3WcGfxMgu/gitcenter.git`). And, if possible, to also push, sign and publish it with that.

issue_comments.body: I agree. And it should also be possible to change description after publishing to the Repository Index.
